channel.title: Raphanus Raphanistrum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Raphanus Raphanistrum on funPlantGenes

item.title: Rr2ODD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: RrC702_p3-1 Gene Symbol: Rr2ODD1 Gene Name: Genome: radish reference genome Species: Raphanus raphanistrum Functional Description: RNA sequencing (RNA-Seq) and Arabidopsis genetic transformation were deployed to identify, clone, and characterize potential genes involved in metabolic resistance to HPPD-inhibiting herbicides.
